forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the sun begins its gentle descent over Downtown San Francisco, the day presents a comforting tableau of mostly sunny skies punctuated by wisps of cloud. Although temperatures are starting to dip around the 63-degree mark, a refreshing west-southwest wind dances through the streets at a brisk 21 mph, adding a slight chill to the evening air. There’s an ever-so-slight chance of drizzle later tonight, yet the bulk of the atmosphere is defined by a subtle clarity, unmarred by the dense fog that often blankets the city.

As evening approaches, the remnants of brightness linger, encouraging a stroll down the Embarcadero or perhaps a leisurely dinner at a cozy nearby café. Dressing in layers would be wise— a light jacket or cardigan to wrap around your shoulders once the sun slips behind the horizon, complemented by comfortable shoes for an impromptu walk along the bay. Enjoy this lovely, temperate afternoon while the light holds, and let the promise of a tranquil evening wash over the city.
